Parameters: SharedPreferences: The @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@ that received the change.
String: The key of the preference that was changed, added, or removed.
onSharedPreferenceChanged(android.conten.Description: Called when a shared preference is changed, added, or removed. This may be called even if a preference is set to its existing value. This callback will be run on your main thread. Note: This callback will not be triggered when preferences are cleared via @B_android#content#SharedPreferences#Editor#clear_E@.
onSharedPreferenceChanged(android.conten.FullName: public abstract void onSharedPreferenceChanged (SharedPreferences sharedPreferences, String key)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a shared preference is changed.
